nodes.text: Batuu Bits was a snack food served at Oga's Cantina at Black Spire Outpost on Batuu.

Batuu Bits is a snack available at Oga's Cantina bar in Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge. It is made up mostly of dried spicy snacks like tortilla chips, dried fish, and wasabi peas. The menus at Disney's Hollywood Studios describe it as "crispy galaxy snack bits with spiced chermoula dip," while the Disneyland menu calls it "a light crisp Snack Mix from the galaxy." When it was initially announced, it did not yet have its final name and was referred to as "Cantina Mix."
